title: All-Party Parliamentary Group on Cats
purpose: The APPG is a group of MPs, peers and associate organisations with an interest in cat welfare, aiming to promote and further cat welfare. It seeks to support discussion and debate about what the public, politicians and the government can do to further cat welfare.

contact_details.registered_contact_address: House of Commons, London, SW1A 0AA. Tel: 020 7219 8493.
contact_details.public_enquiry_point_name: Rich Clare, Battersea Dogs & Cats Home. Tel: 020 3887 8375
contact_details.secretariat: Battersea Dogs & Cats Home and Cats Protection  jointly act as the group's secretariat. https://www.battersea.org.uk/ and https://www.cats.org.uk
